languages.text: {n}Гордо вскинув подбородок, эльдарка обжигает вас полным ненависти взглядом. Но даже перед лицом смерти она не опускается до оскорблений или плевка в лицо. Таковы уж дети Азуриана.{/n}
{n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гордо вскинув подбородок, эльдарка обжигает вас полным ненависти взглядом. Но даже перед лицом смерти она не опускается до оскорблений или плевка в лицо. Таковы уж дети Азуриана.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, the Aeldari burns you with her spiteful gaze full of hatred. Even in the face of death, she doesn't stoop to insults or a spit in the face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

{n}Proudly raising her head, the Aeldari burns you with her spiteful gaze full of hatred. Even in the face of death, she doesn't stoop to insults or a spit in the face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

{n}Proudly raising her head, the Aeldari burns you with her spiteful gaze full of hatred. Even in the face of death, she doesn't stoop to insults or spit in the face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

{n}Proudly raising her head, the Aeldari burns you with her spiteful gaze full of hatred. Even in the face of death, she doesn't stoop to insults or spit in the face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}
{n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}
{n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La Aeldari levanta orgullosamente la cabeza y te fulmina con una mirada rencorosa. Ni siquiera ante la faz de la muerte se rebaja a insultarte o escupirte en la cara. Así son los hijos de Asuryan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La Aeldari levanta orgullosamente la cabeza y te fulmina con una mirada llena de odio. Ni siquiera ante la faz de la muerte se rebaja a insultarte o escupirte en la cara. Así son los hijos de Asuryan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特骄傲地昂起了头，充满憎恨的怨毒目光灼烧着你。即使面对死亡，她也不屑于咒骂或唾口水。这就是阿苏焉的子嗣。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特骄傲地昂起了头，充满憎恨的怨毒目光灼烧着你。即使面对死亡，她也不屑于咒骂或唾口水。这就是阿苏焉的子嗣。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Relevant fièrement la tête, l'Aeldari vous lance un regard méprisant. Même dans ses derniers instants, elle ne s'abaisse pas à vous insulter ou à vous cracher au visage. Ainsi sont les enfants d'Asuryan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Relevant fièrement la tête, l'Aeldari vous lance un regard rempli de haine et de mépris. Même face à la mort, elle ne s'abaisse pas à vous insulter ou vous cracher au visage. Ainsi sont les enfants d'Asuryan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}誇らしげに頭を上げた彼女は、憎悪に満ちた唾棄すべき眼差しであなたを睨みつける。最期の瞬間を前にしても、侮辱や唾を吐きかけるようなことはしない。それがアシュリアンの御子らというものなのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}誇らしげに頭を上げたアエルダリは、憎悪に満ちた唾棄すべきまなざしであなたを睨みつける。死を前にしても、侮辱や唾を吐きかけるようなことはしない。それがアシュリアンの御子らというものなのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie hebt stolz den Kopf und verbrennt dich mit ihrem hasserfüllten Blick. Selbst in ihren letzten Augenblicken lässt sie sich nicht dazu herab, dich zu beleidigen oder dir ins Gesicht zu spucken. So sind die Kinder von Asuryan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Aeldari hebt stolz den Kopf und verbrennt dich mit ihrem hasserfüllten Blick. Selbst im Angesicht des Todes sinkt sie nicht so tief, Beleidigungen auszusprechen oder dir ins Gesicht zu spucken. So sind die Kinder von Asuryan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, gururla başını kaldırıyor. Kindar bakışlarıyla seni alev alev yakıyor. Son saniyelerinde bile hakaret edecek ya da yüzüne tükürecek kadar alçalmıyor. Tam da Asuryan'ın Çocukları'ndan beklendiği gibi...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Proudly raising her head, she burns you with her spiteful gaze. Even in her final moments, she does not stoop to insults or spitting in your face. Such are the Children of Asuryan.{/n}
